metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27781 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: User credentials can be manipulated and stolen by Native CephFS consumersof OpenStack Manila, resulting in potential privilege escalation. An OpenStack Manila user can request access to a share to an arbitrary cephx user,including existing users. The access key is retrieved via the interfacedrivers. Then, all users of the requesting OpenStack project can view theaccess key. This enables the attacker to target any resource that the userhas access to. This can be done to even "admin" users, compromising theceph administrator. This flaw affects Ceph versions prior to 14.2.16, 15.xprior to 15.2.8, and 16.x prior to 16.2.0.

criterions.comment: ceph package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
